## Source: ossf-package-analysis (af5eb7081dde9d70a0712995098c35c53b72258056714c3dbefd6a3d194d6ed3)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@plentyofcode/header-bidding-adslot' @ 2.0.36 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
